item.title: [Server/Client] Developing for PI [READ] [Free!] [Looking to help] [WebDesign]
item.dc:creator: @godswords godswords
item.description:
@godswords wrote:

Hey guys on moparscape,

I have decided I really want to work on a PI server that I see has some potential of growing (that means you have to have a plan). I can do client/server sided work. I am also ok on web design (not the best, not the worst). [size=18pt]If you think your server has potential of growing and is a PI server, please contact me at my skype: pbotgold4service. [/size]

[size=8pt]Server’s with pre-existing communities will be given the priority.[/size]

public class Please Consider Me { public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println("Please consider me as a developer for your server!"); } }

[size=10pt]P.S: If your server doesn’t have a vps host or dedicated host, I will probably reject the offer (they don’t get very far)[/size]

Read full topic
